滅.definition: to extinguish or put out; to go out (of a fire etc); to exterminate or wipe out; to drown

滅亡.definition: to be destroyed; to become extinct; to perish; to die out; to destroy; to exterminate

滅口.definition: to kill sb to prevent them from divulging a secret; to silence sb

滅團.definition: (video gaming) to eliminate an entire team; to get wiped out

滅失.definition: loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)

滅度.definition: to extinguish worries and the sea of grief; nirvana (Buddhism)

滅族.definition: extermination of an entire family (ancient Chinese punishment)

滅此朝食.definition: lit. not to have breakfast until the enemy is destroyed; anxious to do battle (idiom)

滅種.definition: to commit genocide; to become extinct; extinction of a race

滅絕.definition: to become extinct; to die out; to lose (sth abstract) completely; to exterminate

滅絕人性.definition: (idiom) to be devoid of all humanity; inhuman; bestial
